name: They come from below!
description:
One player is trying to stay alive as the blue player, while the other is trying to kill them as the green triangle. The goal of the game is for the blue player to live for as long as possible. The green triangle can launch zombies, which follow the blue player.

Controls:

W - Blue Player Jump - Jumping on zombies kills them

A - D - Left and Right movement for Blue

Left and Right Arrow - Left and Right movement for green triangle

Up arrow - Launch zombie. 2 second cooldown and 2 zombies at once
